meanings.sent1: The alguacils patrolled the town to ensure safety.
meanings.sent2: The alguacils were respected members of the community.
meanings.sent3: The alguacils stopped a cat for speeding - it was a funny sight!
meanings.sent4: The alguacils were like guardians, watching over the town.
meanings.sent5: The shiny badges of the alguacils gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To serve as a law enforcement officer
meanings.sent1: He alguacils diligently, upholding the law with pride.
meanings.sent2: She alguacils with dedication and honor.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to alguacils, wearing a tiny police hat.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, she alguacils with the strength of a lion.
meanings.sent5: The young recruit alguacils with enthusiasm, eager to make a difference.
